sentences.en: At some point, early colonists crossbred smaller European-bred stock with American wild turkeys to produce hearty but tame breeds such as the Standard Bronze.
sentences.cn: 从某个时候开始，早期的殖民者将欧洲饲养的体型较小的火鸡与美国野火鸡杂交，从而培育出了标准青铜色火鸡这样健硕而温驯的火鸡品种。

sentences.en: Crossbred boar is the offspring of purebred boar cross - fertilized with Commercial Pigs.
sentences.cn: 野家杂交猪是含有一定野猪血统的杂交猪.

sentences.en: Crossbred Duroc was not better than pure ones for litter size at birth.
sentences.cn: 系间杂交公猪所配母猪的产仔数也与纯系所配母猪的产仔数相近.

sentences.en: Generally speaking , crossbred fruits are always very tasty.
sentences.cn: 串秧儿的水果一般都很好吃.

sentences.en: Grass of crossbred color page is vivacious herb, its alias has multicoloured revive, foreign purple perilla.
sentences.cn: 杂种彩叶草为多年生草本植物，其别名有五彩苏、洋紫苏等。

sentences.en: Intramusclar fat contents acre distinctively higher sired by crossbred Duroc than by pure animals.
sentences.cn: 台系杜洛克所配后代的胴体瘦肉率最高.

sentences.en: Mobile Ad hoc network is a crossbred of computer network and wireless communication.
sentences.cn: 移动自组网具有传统计算机网络及无线通信网络两方面的复杂性.

sentences.en: New hybrid lines were selected using the new restoring crossbred with different sterile lines.
sentences.cn: 新恢复系与不同的不育系配制成不同类型的杂交稻组合.

sentences.en: Next month, biologists should know how many females are pregnant and how many crossbred babies will be born this year.
sentences.cn: 下个月，生物学家就将得知，该计划中有多少雌性侏儒兔已经怀孕以及今年将诞生多少杂交的兔宝宝。

sentences.en: Those sets of chromosomes come from the varieties originally crossbred to create the clone.
sentences.cn: 这两种葡萄来源于皮诺瓦品种的杂交无性后代.

words.tran_cn: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
十字路口；杂交；横渡；横道

trans.tran_en: (of plants or animals) produced as a result of crossbreeding
a crossbred plant or animal, esp an animal resulting from a cross between two pure breeds

trans.tran_cn: 杂交繁育(crossbreed的过去式和过去分词)
